message: Have you ever noticed that people, who share your tastes in music, get along with you much faster than those whose tastes are very different from yours?
author: author

message: Who doesn't love music? Whatever mood we have - bad or good, from time to time we turn on our favorite song. And it, in turn, either calms us, or on the contrary, makes us fall into melancholy.
author: Igor Zaharov

message: Many people believe that music is first and foremost an instrument of the soul. Probably it is so.
author: Alex Minth

message: Absolutely all people of every type around the world are not indifferent to the music.
author: Ivan Ivanov

message: Our planet is the only place where a human being might live. Unfortunately, scientists haven’t yet discovered other planets, to where a person may move and live the rest of life.
author: Olga111

message: A human being is able not only to create but also to destroy.
author: Igor Vatt

message: Factories regularly emit harmful chemicals into the air.
author: Jhon Doe

message: That’s why we have to take care of the Earth and look after our nature and surroundings as well as possible.
author: Jhon Doe
